text:
We had a lovely experience in this house.   I tried out both beds and both were great.  The sheets in the master were yummy.   Everything we needed was available.  Good location to city and safe, cool funky neighborhood.   If you are bothered by cooing doves all the time then think twice but otherwise perfect. 
Anna was prompt with her communication and a wonderful host.
title: Remodeled Mid-Century Bungalow
